entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Hyper Light Drifter
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$2.49 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition. ‚ñ∫ Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival. ‚ñ∫ 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage. ‚ñ∫ 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration. ‚ñ∫ Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences. ‚ñ∫ 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action. ‚ñ∫ 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own. Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease. Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies. Features: ‚óè 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad. ‚óè Compatible with MFi controllers. ‚óè Game Center achievements. ‚óè Haptic Vibration. ‚óè From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated. ‚óè Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare. ‚óè Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound. ‚óè Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace. ‚óè All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö$4.99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö$5.99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö$5.99
  • Game EditorÔºö$5.99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö$2.99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö$2.99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö$4.99
  • InvestmentÔºö$1.99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö$5.99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ghost Detector: Haunted Radar
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.19]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user. ‚Ä¢ This application might scare you. ‚Ä¢ All sensors are on one page. ‚Ä¢ A real radar to track anomalies. ‚Ä¢ Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector. ‚Ä¢ Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off. ‚Ä¢ More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them. Warning: If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately. Disclaimer: Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Doraemon Dorayaki Shop Story
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$14.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

Application Description

A game where you run a sweets shop with the popular manga character Doraemon. Let's make Doraemon's favorite dorayaki and create a store that will be the talk of the town. First, make the sweets, set up the shelves, prepare the tables, and get ready to run the shop! In addition, various characters from Fujiko„ÉªF„ÉªFujio's works will appear as customers! Many characters will come, including [T„ÉªP BON] and [Kiteretsu Encyclopedia]. During your adventure to find ingredients, you will encounter many difficulties. Even in such a situation, Doraemon's secret gadgets will help you solve difficult problems without any difficulty! A management game created by Kairosoft, a company popular for its simulation games. Enjoy Doraemon's unique adventures.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
